hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"I watched the Prophet (S) for a month. In the two Rak'ah before Fajr he would recite: Say: "O you disbelievers!" and Say: "Allah is One

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَخْفِيفِ رَكْعَتَىِ الْفَجْرِ وَمَا كَانَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَقْرَأُ فِيهِمَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Brevity Of The Two Rak'ah Of Fajr And What The Prophet (S) Would Recite In Them
